holidays.title: International Jazz Day
holidays.description: Take a musical look at a distinctly American art form.

holidays.title: Day of the Child
holidays.description: This day recognizes the significance of cultivating the habit of reading among children.

holidays.title: Denim Day
holidays.description: Sexual assault victims deserve all your support and your voice this Denim Day!

holidays.title: Hairstyle Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Change your look on this special day! Get your hair done this Hairstyle Appreciation Day.

holidays.title: Healthy Kids Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready to enjoy a fun Healthy Kids Day with the YMCA!

holidays.title: Honesty Day
holidays.description: The whole truth and nothing but the truth? That's right!

holidays.title: Israel Memorial Day
holidays.description: Prepare to honor the fallen Israeli soldiers and victims of terrorist attacks!

holidays.title: Military Brats Day
holidays.description: Today, we celebrate the kids of the armed forces.

holidays.title: Mr. Potato Head Day
holidays.description: Relive your happy childhood memories with the beloved “Toy Story” character — Mr. Potato Head!

holidays.title: National Adopt A Shelter Pet Day
holidays.description: Discover interesting stories and facts about adopting pets.

holidays.title: National Animal Advocacy Day
holidays.description: This National Animal Advocacy Day, let’s celebrate animals and change the world!

holidays.title: National Bubble Tea Day
holidays.description: We cannot get enough of the creamy sweet tea drink with pearly tapioca balls on top.

holidays.title: National Bugs Bunny Day
holidays.description: National Bugs Bunny Day commemorates the date this happy-go-lucky bunny made his first appearance in 1938.

holidays.title: National Larry Day
holidays.description: Take the day to celebrate your favorite Larry, whether real or fictional, famous or not.

holidays.title: National Mahjong Day
holidays.description: Take a day to admire the beauty of this challenging game, or learn how to play!

holidays.title: National Oatmeal Cookie Day
holidays.description: Fret not about those calories as you dig into this healthy yet sweet munchie!

holidays.title: National PrepareAthon Day
holidays.description: Ensure you plan to keep yourself prepared for future unexpected man-made and natural disasters.

holidays.title: National Raisin Day
holidays.description: We celebrate to America’s favorite sun-soaked snack.

holidays.title: National Sarcoidosis Day
holidays.description: 70% of people affected by sarcoidosis are aged between 20 and 40.

holidays.title: National Tabby Day
holidays.description: Celebrate our furry friends and spread the word: tabbies are not a cat breed.

holidays.title: National Therapy Animal Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Therapy Animal Day by showing your love for our helpful furry friends.

holidays.title: National Tie Dye Day
holidays.description: This Tie Dye Day, let your inner artist out by using your garments as a canvas.

holidays.title: Queen's Day
holidays.description: Queen’s Day is one of the most special celebrations in the Netherlands.

holidays.title: Spank Out Day
holidays.description: Recent studies have shown that spanking does little more than traumatizing children.

holidays.title: Walpurgis Night
holidays.description: To fend off evil spirits, celebrate Walpurgis Night by blazing bonfires all night.

holidays.title: World Stationery Day
holidays.description: It’s a day to put pen to paper and do things the old-fashioned way.

holidays.title: Ayisha Diaz’s Birthday
holidays.description: She once told herself that she’ll be famous and look where she is now.

holidays.title: BeastBoyShub’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about Indian YouTuber and gaming sensation BeastBoyShub.

holidays.title: Dianna Agron’s Birthday
holidays.description: For her beauty and charm, this former Gleek was featured in a Japanese song.

holidays.title: Gal Gadot’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented star first tried Reese’s peanut butter cup on the “Tonight’s Show Starring Jimmy Fallon.”

holidays.title: Travis Scott’s Birthday
holidays.description: This eight-time Grammy Awards nominee launched a limited edition McDonald’s meal under his name.
